instruction: Assign nurse to log each actuation ("hit") of the patient’s budesonide-formoterol inhaler so remaining doses can be tracked accurately.

attributes.comment: Track each inhaler “hit” so remaining doses can be monitored accurately.
attributes.title: Log each actuation of patient’s budesonide-formoterol inhaler

instruction: Refill budesonide-formoterol 80 mcg-4.5 mcg inhalation, 2 puffs twice daily, 5-week supply (additional canister[s]) for mild intermittent asthma, anticipating possible supply disruption.
